name: The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords
name_original: The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords
description:
The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords is an action-adventure game developed by Capcom and Nintendo. It was originally released in 2002. Nintendo published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords is available on Game Boy Advance, Nintendo DS and Nintendo 3DS.
It was produced by Takashi Tezuka. Hidemaro Fujibayashi directed the game. It was scored by Koji Kondo.
